Package metaface.client

Interface Summary
HTTPListener Used by the client's to listen for messages from the HTTPServer Copyright (c) 1996,1997,1998 Sun Microsystems, Inc.
 

Class Summary
DefaultMetaFaceApplet This default class handles the instantiation of a MetaFace applet within the browser
DefaultMetaFaceClient This class a default MetaFace client based on the client side framework design (server-free)
HTTPClient Implementation of a basic HTTP client for Firewall tunneling.
MetaFaceApplet This class handles the instanciation of MetaFace in the browser by providing an Applet
MetaFaceClient This class defines the base level client behaviour for the MetaFace framework.
MetaFaceHTTPClient This class allows communication with a MetaFace framework server via HTTP.
MetaFaceIndependentClient This class implements the client-side (server free) framework design.
TextControl This class is allows text field input for an applet
VHMLOutputAccess This class allows XML parsing errors to propogate due to privileged actions.
VHMLOutputErrorHandler Error handler to report XML errors and warnings during VHML Output parsing
VHMLOutputReader This class is used to construct an eXtensible Markup Language (XML) parser for a Virtual Human Markup Language (VHML) output document.
VHMLOutputTagReader This class is used to read pre-rendered Facial Animation Parameters (FAPs), phonemes, Uniform Resource Locators (URLs) and text from an eXtensible Markup Language (XML) file.
